original_title: Huang Fei Hong zhi nan er dang bao guo
overview: Wong Fei Hong (Wong Kwan) must fight against slave trader Master Eleven (Ji Chun Hua) and Prefect Wu to stop the Chinese being sold as slaves work in the gold mines in America.

production_companies.name: Mei Ah Films Production Co. Ltd.

title: Fist from Shaolin
